content.raw:
I think the implementation can be flexible enough so that levels don't need to be next to each other, we just need to make sure that the robot is still simulated even when it is outside any levels. The levels are mainly dictating when static models are loaded and unloaded.

I'm still not fully convinced that user-defined levels are a good idea. It is quite error-prone and we will end up having to do a series of sanity checks. I think we're going with this idea for now mostly as a proof of concept and I think it would be good to eventually move on to automatically defined levels. @azeey , feel free to pitch in.
